attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The voice of the people must be heard; following the recent expense scandals elections across the UK are the only way for justice to be served and Parliament and Democracy to be saved for future generations.

As such, we call on the Prime Minister to put the welfare of the House before personal or party considerations and dissolve Parliament immediately.

Alternatively where this does not occur expeditiously, we respectfully support HRH The Queen in directly dissolving Parliament and thus allowing the electorate to exercise their will through elections.

As is often said, "if you've done nothing wrong, you've nothing to fear."

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
